summary: The Revenue Department is holding a public hearing on October 9, 2018, at the Hoover State Office Building in Des Moines, Iowa, to discuss proposed rule changes regarding sales and use tax for commercial fertilizer. These changes aim to amend specific chapters of the Iowa Administrative Code to improve clarity and accuracy. The Department received a petition for rule-making in April 2018, leading to the decision to rescind and amend certain rules. The changes are in line with Iowa Code sections 423.3 and 421.17. The public hearing will allow for both oral and written comments, and accommodations will be made for attendees with hearing or mobility impairments.
